Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of J.T. Snow
Dear Sir,
J.T. Snow has nothing more to prove at AA Buffalo Bisons!
He has an AVG of .298 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/4/1990
Subject: Status of Todd Hundley
Dear Sir,
Todd Hundley isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Buffalo Bisons!
He has an AVG of .192, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
